## Enumerations

### enum class  {#a97b00c8e300bcf67f4473baf957f1892}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="enum class llvm::xray::RecordTypes "
 labels = {["strong"]}>
Determines the supported types of records that could be seen in XRay traces.

<EnumerationList title="Enumeration values">

<Link id="a97b00c8e300bcf67f4473baf957f1892a331b3100a485d8cacff1d3df8e9b0c13" />
<EnumerationListItem name="ENTER">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a97b00c8e300bcf67f4473baf957f1892aa42b2fb0e720a080e79a92f4ca97d927" />
<EnumerationListItem name="EXIT">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a97b00c8e300bcf67f4473baf957f1892af1f3009e38d66163f03975af148bb8fa" />
<EnumerationListItem name="TAIL_EXIT">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a97b00c8e300bcf67f4473baf957f1892a88c8a800b3fe4ea6c2fc2524f7ee2645" />
<EnumerationListItem name="ENTER_ARG">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a97b00c8e300bcf67f4473baf957f1892a624782357b787994e7624c941d945a0b" />
<EnumerationListItem name="CUSTOM_EVENT">

</EnumerationListItem>

<Link id="a97b00c8e300bcf67f4473baf957f1892af5f044ed2f1c57504ebd8016581116f4" />
<EnumerationListItem name="TYPED_EVENT">

</EnumerationListItem>

</EnumerationList>

This may or may not correspond to actual record types in the raw trace (as the loader implementation may synthesize this information in the process of of loading).

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/xray/xrayrecord-h/#l00057">57</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/xray/xrayrecord-h">XRayRecord.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### loadInstrumentationMap() {#aa457a825eb8236aa6f36de72e86109ca}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; InstrumentationMap &gt; llvm::xray::loadInstrumentationMap (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Filename)</>}>
Loads the instrumentation map from |Filename|.

This auto-deduces the type of the instrumentation map.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/xray/instrumentationmap-h/#l00034">34</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/xray/instrumentationmap-h">InstrumentationMap.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/xray/instrumentationmap-cpp/#l00256">256</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/xray/instrumentationmap-cpp">InstrumentationMap.cpp</a>.

### loadProfile() {#ab67d7aaee3e9b7f980823af5cde41fcb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; Profile &gt; llvm::xray::loadProfile (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Filename)</>}>
This function will attempt to load an XRay Profiling Mode profile from the provided |Filename|.

For any errors encountered in the loading of the profile data from |Filename|, this function will return an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> condition appropriately.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/xray/profile-cpp/#l00262">262</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/xray/profile-cpp">Profile.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
